title: ISic004281. Epitaph of Lucceia Prima
body:
Facsimile Images

1LUCCEIA
2PRIMAMATER

Apparatus criticus

Text according to ILipara 772; It is unclear if the marks at the end of line 1 are S (so Bernabo-Cavalier in M-L XI.i, p. 294) or a hedera, or just damage.

English translation

Lucceia Prima, mother.

Italian translation

Lucceia Prima, madre.

commentary

bibliography

  • 772 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000541
